text: Oh, look who's back. Heard you gave that old man your precious medicine.
Yeah. He needed it more than anyone else.
Hah. Always playing the hero, huh? You think anyone's gonna remember that when you're starving next week?
I'm not doing it for anyone to remember. I'm doing it because it's right.
Right or wrong doesn't matter down here. Only survival does.
You'll learn that sooner or later, Sal.
